website_summaries.verdict: Great energy boost in a portable, concentrated shot. A bit pricey, though. Plenty of flavors to choose from and low calorie count, too.
pros: Not filling — it's a shot instead of a whole drink
Plenty of flavors to choose from
cons: A bit on the expensive side

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, Great seller
customer_reviews.text: I get these for $2.40/bottle at the grocery store, so I love being able to get them for under $2/bottle. I have to get up for work at 5 am, so I wouldn't make it through the morning without it. Don't take it on an empty stomach, though. It seems like they've improved the taste somewhat. I used to have to gag them down. As for the seller, these bottles came pristine in the box, no leakage. If you read the reviews of people selling the 24 packs, commenters have complained about the bottles leaking. It's worth it to pay a little more than having to mess with leaky bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Bethanne Schrecengost

customer_reviews.title: PRICE FLUCUATION IS CRAZY
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in January for $24.98 - I have seen this same seller sell them as high at $37.00. That is insane. I use only half of a bottle for the gym or right before I need a spark of energy. The flavor is decent but I don't like ANY of them.. this one is the best for your money. Only buy this box when its priced here for $24.00-$28.00. They can be up to $3.49 per bottle retail in the stores in OHIO. I would not drink the whole bottle at once. Please sip!!! Lots of caffeine in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Heather J

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me going without a crash. I have come to realize that I don't sleep well if I take one to late at night. I don't feel buzzed or jittery, just awake. I always keep these in stock. The berry and grape are my favorite!!
customer_reviews.author: JKelly

customer_reviews.title: Your not gonna find a better price for a case of extra strength 5 hours
customer_reviews.text: Your not gonna find a better price for a case of extra strength 5 hours!!!!! Buying them single bottles at basically $4.50, is ridiculous buying it by the case is the way to go. especially when you only use half a bottle at a time ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Lmo Jackson

customer_reviews.title: wakes you up!
customer_reviews.text: if you feel like crap just drink this you will wake up guaranteed
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Clears the mental fog / drowsiness
customer_reviews.text: No jitteriness. It's really the vitamins, not the caffeine, that makes this product work. I always keep one around if driving evenings or nights. Also great to up your capabilities at work.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo Blackboots

customer_reviews.title: Works decently well, but tastes awful
customer_reviews.text: The box was sent in an envelope, so obviously it was smashed open and all the bottles were loose in there. I guess nothing really bad happened, because the bottles were all intact. Anyway, this stuff helps keep me focused for a while when I'm dying of tiredness at my very early morning job. I think part of what drags me awake is the terrible, terrible taste. Honestly, it's like burning vomit with a hint of a "red" after taste. It's very tart on top of that.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing, save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like 5hr, tastes like 5hr, but definitely doesn’t work like 5hr and I should know. I’ve Ben drinking 5hr since 2011 and I usually buy the 10-pack from Walmart, for about the same price (give or take a $1). I’ve onlu ordered 5hr from Amazon one other time and the same thing happened. Either these are counterfeit, or they say on a shelf way too long and lost their “potency”, in any case, I say take it from an avid 5hr extra person, these are not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Patty C.

customer_reviews.title: What happen to the packaging?
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is my go to in buying bulk amount of these 5hr energy drinks. They usually comes in a box when they arrive. But this time it came in a shipping pouch! Guess what happen? Well, the box it came with is destroyed as seen in the picture. A bubble wrap works way better guys! Luckily, each container has no leaks. This is unacceptable as a consumer.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Helps me a lot when I haven't got enough sleep but need to stay active/ work
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the very few caffeinated drinks that have worked for me. I was surprised by its effectiveness the first time cause TBH I didn't expect anything. I don't drink this regularly though; maybe once a week when I need to remain active despite not having enough sleep and thus feeling sleepy. Great price as well and getting the 12pk is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonmoy

customer_reviews.title: Boost of energy in shot form.
customer_reviews.text: 5-hour Energy is a good alternative to other energy type drinks as it's in shot form so it doesn't fill you up. It gives me an extra boost of energy but doesn't keep me from falling asleep at night. The taste is on the sweet side but since you're probably not sipping on the drink, it's not a major factor.
customer_reviews.author: Vu

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff But Does Not Always Arrive in Stellar Condition...
customer_reviews.text: Purchase several flavors of 5 Hour energy extra regularly, and some family members prefer the berry flavor. Unfortunately it occasionally arrives looking battle weary. This last was the worst having been shipped in a padded yellow envelope. Box + liquid + envelope = big wet nope. Wish there was a way to guarantee intact arrival!!
customer_reviews.author: Froglegs

customer_reviews.text: it gets me through long nights but i will say your veins WILL start to hurt and experience palpitations if you exceed a certain threshold. consume with caution. will probably give me hypervitaminosis b on account of there being a grand TWENTY THOUSAND EIGHT HUNDRED PERCENT of your daily vitamin b intake in one bottle. tastes like if you mixed gatorade and battery acid together, but coffee is for losers.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Feng

customer_reviews.title: I am an addict
customer_reviews.text: This stuff doesn't taste great, but I think it's the best flavor they make and isn't too bad. I consume one bottle a day on average, and normally sip it over a 3 hour period. It prevents headaches from caffeine withdraw, because it contains caffeine. I also have a better ability to focus and a slight increase in energy and wakefulness.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Really good value if you drink these
customer_reviews.text: I use these occasionally when I need extra energy - I feel like the energy wears off quickly and I crash really hard on them but sometimes I just need to use them. at my local drugstore I believe they're 2/5 for these come out to a good deal when you buy in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Noah B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't take these often but when I do any number of things WILL get done!
customer_reviews.author: Eve Hope

customer_reviews.title: Gives my energy.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong flavor but I take one before I got to work in my yard and wow I work harder than I did 20years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Stuart

customer_reviews.title: IT'S  OK...MAYBE I ONLY NEED THE REGULAR STRENGTH.
customer_reviews.text: I think the B12 shots maybe more effective for me. The extra strength does not seem to lend sny added punch.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Cookie

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hey....I like the stuff. It Does what you expect. If you buy frequently....shop A bit...usually find one flavor of other on sale.I'm not picky....I buy according to the deal I get.
customer_reviews.author: That'sAll_Folks

customer_reviews.title: Great for added energy
customer_reviews.text: This product gives me energy. It gets me up and going in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, the same as sold individually. The packaging is flimsy, intended for store shelves. I thought it would be in a regular box.
customer_reviews.author: LoneStarBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product that can be bought in a value pack
customer_reviews.text: 5 hour energy is very effective and gives you needed energy. And buying this pack from amazon is a good value versus buying it individually from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Ward

customer_reviews.title: 5 hour is the original and the best.....don't even try a "knock off" you'll be disappointed !
customer_reviews.text: Love 5 hour energy. Tried a cheap knock off and was very disappointed . Gives me the right amount of "wake up" since I don't drink coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn's Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Save money buy these here!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love 5 hour energy but I love it more for this price then retail.
customer_reviews.author: TripleG1976

customer_reviews.title: Best Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and this flavor. This is the best price I can find anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B Harkins

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very good price. Can't really say more than that.
customer_reviews.author: christopher gray

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend buying bulk
customer_reviews.text: Worked at first but didn't work any more, maybe I got immune to it
customer_reviews.author: Marsy

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and Works well
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and its flavor. Works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: 5 hour energy drink
customer_reviews.text: I buy the product all the time. The Berry flavor is good.
customer_reviews.author: luckylady1957

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Was tore up just pieces in the bag , 2 or 3 of the bottles had leaked out which I think is what caused the box to get wet and coming apart
customer_reviews.author: cody easley

customer_reviews.title: Love the missing sugar crash
customer_reviews.text: I like all of the 5 hours I’ve tried so far
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that always works for me and I don't have side affects.
customer_reviews.author: candy

customer_reviews.title: Works and tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Works and tastes great! Gives me the energy to get through my day and workouts
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: GOTTA HAVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I drive 200 miles on average every day. I don't drink coffee so these are a lifesaver for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dean C.

customer_reviews.title: Good energy shots
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering these every month. I wait for the right price and then order. These work for me
customer_reviews.author: Tempest

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: I have seen many people drinking energy drinks. I always thought I did not need them. I was given a free sample of 5Hour with a purchase I made. It was free so I gave it a try. Now I am buying the stuff by the case. The down side...It is not the best tasting stuff you will ever drink. Let's just say it's a little bitter.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: 5-Hour Energy is the only energy shot that doesn't make me crash and really keeps my energy up to stay focused whenever I take it. For some reason when I take it in the morning the energy seems to last longer than when I take it around 2:30 or any other time. Maybe it's because I'm on an emptier stomach. Stuff works great!
customer_reviews.author: Steve P.

customer_reviews.title: Great energy shot
customer_reviews.text: The Berry taste is great and it really gives you energy
customer_reviews.author: karen kelley

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered as expected. Boy do these things pack a punch!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: These are a great price off Amazon when you can catch them on ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! These are a great price off Amazon when you can catch them on the lower price. The price seems to fluctuate all the time but it's still cheaper than the stores! No crash!
customer_reviews.author: N. Lieu

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: We got tired of paying $3/4 dollars a bottle for these. Decided to stock up. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ccmill

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Allows me to do stupid tasks with more energy! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Erma

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love orange as a flavor but this is a little strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: If you drink these a lot, I would advise you to buy them here.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie2296

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Ordering on line can be surprising once you receive the merchandise.The product was exact in flavor and count .
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottles.
customer_reviews.text: Two of the bottles were broken when I received the order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Shipment
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed to receive a leaking box of products. No recourse on this order because it is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Girl

customer_reviews.title: The short version: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this over the normal 5 Hour Energy which does very little for me. This is enough to wake me up when I really need it and doesn't make me jittery in the slightest. Whatever blend they use seems perfect for just a pickup of energy and wakefulness.
customer_reviews.author: HonoraryOrange

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! Helps him get through the day with the energy he needs! Perfect gift to buy in bulk! They can be pricey to buy individually.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Tastes awful.
customer_reviews.text: The taste of the .energy drinks was awful and I will not purchase the 7-11 drinks again
customer_reviews.author: Candie

customer_reviews.title: Increased energy with no jitters
customer_reviews.text: I don't drink this very often but when I need an immediate jump in energy or to stay awake this is my go to. Works great. No jitters or side effects.
customer_reviews.author: boxfan

customer_reviews.title: better than normal strength.
customer_reviews.text: Good. Very strong though. Probably drink half at a time. Makes my hands shake a little if I drink the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness for 5-Hour!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It gets me revving for my early morning workouts!! :) :) Thank goodness someone made this because it has gotten me through the day!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn S.

customer_reviews.title: I like the energy drinks
customer_reviews.text: I like energy drinks. I often take one just before leaving the house in the mornings because I can be soooo tired. I myself have not experienced any shakes or any other side effects. These things simply wake me up. I don't really feel it or notice anything other than I'm no longer tired. I do not find that they last a full 5 hrs... but they do last me 3 - 4. If I'm having a good day, I'm good to go. If I'm having a long day, I'll take one more which gets me to home. I now buy these by the case and look for the most inexpensive pricing as these can be pretty costly.
customer_reviews.author: terster

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Extra Strength and I received Regular Strength, this was the second tome it has happened.
customer_reviews.author: Not Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this for a boost of energy. Does not make me jittery or nervous like most energy products.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mcilwain

customer_reviews.title: Not yummy but does energize
customer_reviews.text: Same as always. Not a horrible taste or I wouldn't drink it but it isn't something you want to sip either.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No crash for me ever. Sometimes I just drink a third or half. Full bottle when on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Wilson

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: I like to drink 5 hour energy when I am really tired, so having a stash of it is very convenient. The berry flavor tastes good and the price was much better than any store prices I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: J-Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: needed for getting out of the house fast wo spending a lot of time drinking coffee. this stuff is dynamite and doesnt cause an f***ing crash when it wears off. good for about 4 to 5 hours. i gave my son some for an early trip to the airport. great stuff. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Henry

customer_reviews.title: A staple at our house.
customer_reviews.text: My husband swears by these.... uses them before he goes to the gym for extra energy, and for alertness during a long drive.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Page Campbell

customer_reviews.title: If you're a caffeine addict...
customer_reviews.text: Way better deal than I could find at any retailer. Much better caffeine supplement than energy drinks or coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Good for graves
customer_reviews.text: These extra strength do a decent job at keeping me awake on graveyards. I would usually only need half the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Deserteagle

customer_reviews.title: As described and arrived on time.  Look forward to buying again in the future.
customer_reviews.text: As described and arrived on time. Look forward to buying again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives me just the boost I need working night shift.
customer_reviews.author: WeeklyBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Helps my dad through his day
customer_reviews.text: My dad uses these daily to help him stay awake while operating a computer at work and he keeps wanting refills every month.
customer_reviews.author: D. Woods

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ENERGY THAT LAST!
customer_reviews.text: I love it it gives me energy I have fibromalgia and it hurts to move.it works!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele King

customer_reviews.title: Product is great. Price is not competitive if you are a ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Price is not competitive if you are a Costco or Sam's Club member, when they carry it.
customer_reviews.author: hollis

customer_reviews.title: They are a great price compared to buying off line
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my husband. They are a great price compared to buying off line.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Shipped exactly as expected and works exactly as one would ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipped exactly as expected and works exactly as one would expect any 5-hour energy brand extra strength shot works.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: good, but not amazing
customer_reviews.text: Better than drinking a full size energy drink. Not amazing taste, but not terrible either.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Get me through the day
customer_reviews.text: For a while I was taking one of these every morning in place of coffee or soda. The lack of calories is very nice and they still gave me ample energy for the day. I would recommend these to anyone that is looking for a coffee substitute to their day. They are also fantastic for preventing hangovers, if you are about to go out and drink with friends for a few hours I would recommend these as well. I think the B vitamins that they contain really help the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to coffee. It gives me the boost I need to get me through long days of college and work.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and effective. Small enough to fit in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Tasty and effective. Small enough to fit in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gray

customer_reviews.title: CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: Always works well and seems to bevery safe. Mostly Vitamin B. Who can complain about that. good stuff to keep handy
customer_reviews.author: Michael Keller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as directed. Just don't abuse the product becuase it can leqad to heart conditions if abused!
customer_reviews.author: BrianK

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses one of these after lunch when he gets kind of sleepy and almost nods off. He says it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Clinton

customer_reviews.title: I prefer these over the regular 5 hour energy
customer_reviews.text: These give me the same 5 hour effects of the regular 5 hour energy, except with an extra caffeine boost in the first couple hours. Perfect for driving late at night!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend drinks these every morning, don't know if they work but obviously he thinks they do. Haha!
customer_reviews.author: Kalei Johns

customer_reviews.title: 2 months and going strong
customer_reviews.text: I am not certain the extra strength works any better than the regular...but for the same $$ why not. I have been taking 5 hour energy for 2 months everyday (during the work week) to get the wheels turning and have noticed a little inconsistency in the shots. Nothing huge, somedays they just work better than others...could just be me or the stress load that particular day..still a fan! I look forward to shooting this each morning knowing that I am good until lunch at least and there is no crash to speak of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user for life!

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done but isn't perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Does the trick! -Works great for an extra energy boost in many different situations. I use these for an afternoon pick me up, my husband swears by them for his long 12 hour work days and early mornings, and my sister who works night shifts often uses them to get through the night. Cons: - The taste leaves something to be desired. They're pretty tart and taste kinda like cough syrup. Luckily there isn't much liquid to get down. - If you're not busy running around you might notice that they can cause a bit of stomach upset.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Murray

customer_reviews.title: Looks gross and makes you really nervous about drinking it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 boxes. One was completely covered in spillage from some other leaked box, the other was fine. Both boxes so far; sludge around the bottle opening after removing sealed cap. I don't know if they are going bad, they have an expiration of 11/19.. But it's gross to open every bottle looking like this when it's cap is removed (plastic seal was not broken)
customer_reviews.author: Adam Contreras

customer_reviews.title: 5 Hour energy
customer_reviews.text: Great keeps you awake with no side effects, however now price has increased by to much, going back to coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Roche

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it, been using it for years. Coupons would be great!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Bunce

customer_reviews.title: over powering for me
customer_reviews.text: This works for some but it is alittle too strong for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price and a great product. Use these often, but I prefer buying these in bulk as you usually get a better price. Flavor is great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Zyren

customer_reviews.title: Could literally save your life!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I opened the box and placed one in every console of the vehicles I drive, including my work vehicle, one in my lunch box, and a couple in my EDC bag. These work much better than coffee for me and help to keep my eyes open and on the road when traveling back and forth to jobs. After 13 hour days and an hour drive home these became a necessity some days. IMHO they work better than the regular strength ones and do not offer any of the jitters or stomach aches.
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Works good, price was good
customer_reviews.text: The 5hr energy works as it was supposed to, kept me alert during the middle of the day, and did not inhibit my sleep. Packaging was good and arrived in 2 days
customer_reviews.author: conchRider

customer_reviews.title: POW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Kick in the ass. I love 5 hour energy and this is 5 hour energy on roids. Will definately keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos

customer_reviews.title: feel the surge
customer_reviews.text: Great gets me going in the morning! Beats Coffee hands down
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Oh sweet lord, I love you crack shots.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats these. I've tried Red Rain to save money and was only kidding myself. Amazon is a way better deal buying in bulk than trying to go a la carte at the gas stations. In Massachusetts the single extra strength ones go for at least $3.00 all the way up to $3.99 in Boston. It's a sticker shock buying the bulk when it's nearly $53-55.00 but nothing gets your lethargic ass going like these.
customer_reviews.author: miss-honesty

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I signed up for the subscription and it cost me a quarter of what it cost to buy in the store. Plus it is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good (temporary) price
customer_reviews.text: I won't order this product again since you raised the price six dollars. I can buy elsewhere at lower price
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Great pick me up
customer_reviews.text: I like these.. what can I say? People are always giving me a hard time about drinking them "oh those are bad for you!" then they go across the street and buy a carmel frap. and a slice of pizza. Anyway, I like them. They work for me so BACK OFF! (Billy Madison.. anyone? anyone?)
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: It's a great value! Helps me get through the afternoon slump ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great value! Helps me get through the afternoon slump after lunch at work!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa McCue

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT WITH A CAUTION
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and agree with most of the reviews. There is something that I did not notice anyone mentioning and I feel it is VERY IMPORTANT. I have found that at times I will fall asleep suddenly and unpredictably if I am really tired. The 5HE will support you but when your exhaustion goes beyond a certain point then your body can shut down and you will wake up not even realizing you fell asleep. Good product, but watch it.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Dougal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me awake for a long time, with no crash after.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Salmons

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works
customer_reviews.text: While I admit that some people tell me it does not work as well for them, I can tell you it is the real thing. 5 hours of energy (like it says) with no crash. I've bee using it for years and no ill effects. Great for a morning pick me up as I don't drink coffee. Also good for and afternoon recharge. I rarely go a day without it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me going in the afternoon . . . .
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gohlsen

customer_reviews.title: Will def. give you the kick you need!
customer_reviews.text: 5 hour energy will def. give you the kick you need. Occasionally I will use it if I have had a terribe nights sleep. It wakes me up immediately. But, I only drink half of it. A whole one is too much for me.
customer_reviews.author: bcnewton50

product_meta.title: 5-hour ENERGY Shot, Extra Strength Berry, 1.93 Oz, 12 Count. Energy Shot
product_meta.description: Flavor:BerryNeed an energy boost to get through your day? Grab a Berry flavored Extra Strength 5-hour ENERGY shot. It’s packed with a big energy blend and big taste. The only thing small about it is its size. Take a Berry flavored Extra Strength 5-hour ENERGY shot and get hours of energy. Berry Extra Strength 5-hour ENERGY shots are packed with a blend of B-vitamins, amino acids and caffeine comparable to 12 ounces of the leading premium coffee. Zero sugar, 4 calories, and amazing taste.
feature_bullets: Vitamins, nutrients and about as much caffeine as 12 ounces of the leading premium coffee
Drink it in seconds, feel it in minutes, lasts for hours
